programme.title: Match Game
programme.desc: `Dumb Dora was so dumb that...' is a typical lead-in to `fill-in-the-blank'-style queries asked of contestants seeking to match celebrities' answers. This game show had several incarnations on network TV and in syndication, but throughout it was noted for the double-entendre humor and in-joking byplay among its celebrity panelists, including Charles Nelson Reilly and Richard Dawson (in a stint that launched his kissy-kissy `Family Feud' career). (repeat)
